title: Does the iPhone 13 have a small notch? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's a bit fun some says that the box doesn't contain iphone itself 😂 Joke a part The revolutionary products brand apple doesn't give any updates they will keep on focusing in the new gen iphone (12) so you only get fan updates based on 12 and 12pro series So let's wait my opinion that iphone may have a small notch as OnePlus 6
